website_summaries.verdict: A quality round brush by a top name in hair care. Useful for creating numerous styles and smooth, shiny locks.
pros: Smooths hair and shortens drying times, thanks to the barrel and bristles that are constructed using nanolonic technology
2.5-inch barrel works well for straightening medium to long hair without getting tangled
Can also be used to produce soft waves and body
cons: Barrel gets hot to the touch when using it with a blow dryer
Doesn't work well for very short or very thin hair

product_meta.title: Drybar Full Pint Medium Round Ceramic Brush
feature_bullets: It’s like a curling iron inside your brush! Drybar's Full Pint Medium Round Ceramic Hair Brush is a 2.25" vented ceramic barrel that allows for maximum heat and airflow to lock in volume and curl for long-lasting styles.
Ionic Technology reduces frizz and adds tons of shine while styling.
Bristle design allows for exceptional tension and control. Ergonomic, lightweight handle provides greater comfort.Soft-touch finish and thumbgrip prevent slipping.
HOW TO USE: For loose curls and waves: Use vertically throughout the hair. For volume at the roots: Use horizontally at the crown. For straightening: Use horizontally throughout the hair.

Created for the perfect blowout. Our philosophy is simple: Focus on one thing and be the best at it. For us that's blowouts! We created a full line of hair products and tools to achieve and maintain the perfect blowout.
